oai_dc:dc.dc:title: U-Compare Lemmatisation service
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Web service created by exporting UIMA-based workflow from the U-Compare text mining system. Functionality: Identifies sentences and tokens in plain text. Parts of speech and lemmas are assigned to tokens. Language is automatically identified amongst the supported languages and language-specific processing is carried out. Tools in workflow: Language Identifier, TTL-Tokenizer, TTL-Tagger, TTL-Lemmmatizer (all provided by the Research Institute for Artificial Intelligence (RACAI), Romania) NOTE: The licence provided covers the web service only. Tools used to create the workflow may have their own licences
